name: Nova Pizza Fighting
description:
It's time to play Nova Pizza Fighting !!

Fight with friends -or bots if you don't have friends- to collect pizzas and send them to your mothership. Don't waste time though, the planet is collapsing under your feet!

https://twitter.com/NovaPizzaRacing
